_notes.enabled: Set to false to hide the bar entirely.
_notes.severity: Pick one of: success | info | warning | danger (optional).
_notes.schedule: Provide ISO timestamps (start/end) to control visibility window.
_notes.autoDismissMs: Milliseconds before auto-dismiss. Omit or null to stay open.
_notes.persistent: If true, hides the close button and ignores auto-dismiss.
_notes.message: Supports inline placeholders like {{key|Label}} tying to links entries.
_notes.links: Objects with href/label/target/rel or simple strings.
